mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(title, content, user_idx, create_date, update_date) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{userIdx}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate})
mapper.select: SELECT b.board_no, b.title, b.content, b.user_idx, u.name, b.create_date, b.update_date FROM board b inner join user u on b.user_idx = u.idx WHERE b.board_no = #{id}
